name: Crazy Motorcade
description:
The date is November 22, 1963. The time is 12:30 p.m. and you are driving President John F. Kennedy through the streets of Dallas. You hear a shot ring out, and must get the President to safety! 

It's up to you to save the leader of the free world!

Follow the road out of Dallas to reach Air Force One. Avoid the sniper's sights and traffic to keep the President alive.

Once out of Dallas and onto the highway, pick up boost and launch off the ramps at a high speed to win the game.

Controls

Movement - WASD (or arrow keys)
Boost - Hold Space

Made for the Awful Winter Jam 2018

http://www.awfuljams.com
